abstract: Apple’s earnings beat analysts’ expectations on record sales of its Macintosh computers, showing that Apple is climbing back into the league of dominant computer makers.
snippet: Apple’s earnings beat analysts’ expectations on record sales of its Macintosh computers, showing that Apple is climbing back into the league of dominant computer makers.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Oct. 22 — Apple reported earnings on Monday that leapt ahead of analysts’ already optimistic expectations on record sales of its Macintosh computers.

headline.main: Record Mac Sales Help Apple Earnings Climb 67% in Quarter
headline.print_headline: Record Mac Sales Help Apple Earnings Climb 67% in Quarter

abstract: The company also benefited from Apple’s strong sales of the iPhone, for which AT&T is the sole carrier.
snippet: The company also benefited from Apple’s strong sales of the iPhone, for which AT&T is the sole carrier.
lead_paragraph: AT&T said today that its quarterly profit had risen 42 percent on strong wireless sales and a boost from Apple’s iPhone.

headline.main: AT&T Profit Up 42% on Wireless Gains

abstract: With a market value of $162 billion, Apple is now the most valuable computer maker in the world, and it is the fourth most valuable technology company, after Microsoft, Google and Cisco. It will have to battle all of them to stay on top of the tech world.
snippet: With a market value of $162 billion, Apple is now the most valuable computer maker in the world, and it is the fourth most valuable technology company, after Microsoft, Google and Cisco. It will have to battle all of them to stay on top of the tec...
lead_paragraph: It’s official. Apple is the most valuable computer maker in the world.

headline.main: How Apple Can Keep Its Value
